block.p: Stephanie Jane Ragolia, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William E. Ragolia of Red Bank, N.J., was married yesterday to Robert Theodore Crafa, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Ralph W. Crafa of Northport, N.Y. The Rev. Kevin Keelen performed the ceremony at Holy Cross Roman Catholic Church in Rumson, N.J.
Ms. Ragolia, 30, is keeping her name. She is the recruiting coordinator at Davis Polk & Wardwell, the New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from Hamilton College.

Stephanie Jane Ragolia, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. William E. Ragolia of Red Bank, N.J., was married yesterday to Robert Theodore Crafa, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Ralph W. Crafa of Northport, N.Y. The Rev. Kevin Keelen performed the ceremony at Holy Cross Roman Catholic Church in Rumson, N.J.
Ms. Ragolia, 30, is keeping her name. She is the recruiting coordinator at Davis Polk & Wardwell, the New York law firm. She graduated summa cum laude from Hamilton College.

Mr. Crafa, 30, is the director of the Center for Marine Education and Recreation at Oyster Bay in Oyster Bay, N.Y., and an environmental analyst for Friends of the Bay there. He graduated from Springfield College in Massachusetts and received a master's degree in management and policy from the State University at Stony Brook, N.Y.
